title: Launch button not working in League Client
body: When I open the lol client it all seems normal at first, but when I press launch, it goes black for about 4 seconds then goes back to normal. I'm on 0.76.0.21 if that helps. I know this is a frequent problem, but I have been dealing with it ever since I got league. I fixed it for the first week, (no idea how) but know for 2 days I've tried every trick in the book, including reinstalling. please help!

replies.body: So it sounds like the client flashes that black screen, but then is working normally in the long run? Let me know if this is preventing you from playing the game normally or not.
No, the launch button turns grey for 5 seconds then goes back to normal. sorry for not being descriptive.

Ahaaaa! That's a pretty clear sign that your client lost its connection with our servers, so the Play button disabled since it wouldn't have been able to place you in a match regardless. Let's double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly to cover the basic troubleshooting. Test those steps in a custom game, and let me know how it goes.
No the launch button is not responding not the play button.  by the way thx for the help.
